subtitle: Multiplayer Sudoku, No Ads
description:
Race your mates in real-time Sudoku battles! Free for a limited time.

Challenge others on the same board with the same timer – may the fastest solver win. Or solve solo at your own pace. Clean interface, zero adverts, pure focus.

• Real-Time Multiplayer
Compete side-by-side or remotely on the same puzzle. Fair game, same timer. See who solves it first.

• Solo Play
Relax and solve at your own pace. No pressure, just you and the puzzle.

• Zero Adverts, Zero Nonsense
No coins, no pop-ups, no subscriptions. One price, yours forever.

• All Skill Levels
Easy, medium, or hard puzzles. Brilliant for beginners or Sudoku masters.

Clean, fast, and distraction-free. This is Sudoku done right.
whatsNew: In this version we've improved the playing experience by making small adjustments to the game board.
promotionalText: Limited time: Premium Sudoku, now free. Download before 1st December 2025!
